gtsummary 0.0.0.9000

Reference

Summary Functions

Functions for creating and modifying summary tables

tbl_summary()

Creates a table of summary statistics

add_comparison()

Adds p-values to the output comparing values across groups

add_overall()

Adds a column with overall summary statistics

add_n()

Adds a column with N (or N missing) for each variable

add_stat_label()

Adds a column showing a label for the summary statistics shown in each row

add_q(<tbl_summary>)

Add a column of q values to tbl_summary object to account for multiple comparisons in Rmarkdown

cols_label_summary()

Relabel columns in summary table

tab_style_bold_p(<tbl_summary>)

Bold significant p-values

inline_text(<tbl_summary>)

Report statistics from summary tables inline

tbl_survival(<survfit>)

Tabulate Kaplan-Meier survival probabilities for time-to-event endpoints

inline_text(<tbl_survival>)

Report statistics from survival summary tables inline

Regression Model Functions

Functions for formatting regression model results

tbl_regression()

Display regression model results in table

add_global(<tbl_regression>)

Adds the global p-value for a categorical variables in tbl_regression objects

add_nevent(<tbl_regression>)

Add number of events to a gtsummary regression table

tab_style_bold_p(<tbl_regression>)

Bold significant p-values

inline_text(<tbl_regression>)

Report statistics from regression summary tables inline

tbl_uvregression()

Display univariate regression model results in table

add_global(<tbl_uvregression>)

Adds the global p-value for a categorical variables in tbl_uvregression objects

add_nevent(<tbl_uvregression>)

Add number of events to a gtsummary regression table

add_q(<tbl_uvregression>)

Add a column of q values to tbl_uvregression object to account for multiple comparisons

tab_style_bold_p(<tbl_uvregression>)

Bold significant p-values

inline_text(<tbl_uvregression>)

Report statistics from regression summary tables inline

tbl_merge()

Merge two or more gtsummary regression objects

General Formatting Functions

Functions for formatting

style_percent()

Formats percentages to be displayed in tables or text of report.

style_pvalue()

Formats p-values to be displayed in tables or text of report.

style_sigfig()

Implement significant figure-like formatting

style_ratio()

Implement significant figure-like formatting for ratios

tab_style_bold_labels() tab_style_bold_levels() tab_style_italicize_labels() tab_style_italicize_levels()

Bold or Italicize labels or levels in gtsummary tables

Printing/Misc. Functions

R console and Rmarkdown print defaults

print(<tbl_summary>) knit_print(<tbl_summary>) print(<tbl_regression>) knit_print(<tbl_regression>) print(<tbl_uvregression>) knit_print(<tbl_uvregression>) print(<tbl_survival>) knit_print(<tbl_survival>) print(<tbl_merge>) knit_print(<tbl_merge>)

print and knit_print methods for gtsummary objects

knit_print

A custom printing function

as_gt()

Convert to gt_tbl object

gtsummary_logo()

The biostatR logo, using ASCII or Unicode characters

Imports

Functions imported from other packages

%>%

magrittr forward-pipe operator

knit_print

A custom printing function

S3 Generic Functions

Class-based method functions

add_global()

Adds the global p-value for a categorical variables

add_nevent()

Add number of events to a gtsummary regression table

add_q()

Add a column of q values to account for multiple comparisons

inline_text()

Report statistics from gtsummary tables inline

tbl_survival()

Tabulate univariate statistics for time-to-event endpoints

tab_style_bold_p()

Bold significant p-values

Example Datasets

Simulated data to illustrate package use

trial

Results from a simulated trial of Placebo vs Drug
